meanings.definition: The act or process of coming together to form one mass or whole.
meanings.sent1: The coalescence of the clouds created a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: The coalescence of ideas led to a successful project.
meanings.sent3: The coalescence of flavors in the dish surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The coalescence of voices in the choir filled the room with harmony.
meanings.sent5: The coalescence of colors in the painting made it truly captivating.

meanings.definition: The merging or uniting of different elements into a single entity.
meanings.sent1: The coalescence of the rivers formed a mighty waterfall.
meanings.sent2: The coalescence of cultures enriched the community.
meanings.sent3: The coalescence of sounds in the concert was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent4: The coalescence of talents in the team made them unbeatable.
meanings.sent5: The coalescence of scents in the garden was delightful.
